Name: Ball Army vs Zombie
About the game: Multiple weather scenarios! Cyberpunk! Cool percussion sound! Different kinds of functional zombies! Adjustable image quality! The sound is adjustable! Controllable angle of attack! ➕ Dumb puzzle! Defend against the attack of different zombies This game can challenge the player's hand speed, strategy matching, ball matching, and reasonable distribution of energy. After completing 6 levels, you can experience extremely difficult challenges, and you need to experience non-stop trial and error to summarize the experience and fend off zombies. The picture quality is beautiful，Powered by Unreal Engine 5 （UE5） Low end, minimum image quality for smooth operation -------Tutorial------ 1. Name an archive first 2. Then select the story mode 3. Select the initial ball and click the car to start the game 4. Tap the ball in the scene to take it out 5. Tap Hold to select a green area where the ball can be placed 6. You need to click to select an angle to select the attack area (some balls are not required) 7. Building a ball requires ball energy 8. Tap the purple ball energy randomly dropped in the scene to get the ball energy 9. If you don't click for a long time, the ball energy will disappear with it -------Operate------- * You can use the mouse up and down wheel to switch perspectives *Press E to collect ball energy on the field * Tap to select the ball without release * Slide the mouse to select the attack angle * Right mouse button to cancel placement * Release mouse click to place balls ------- process-------. * Operation: Select the initial ball and click the car to start the game * Victory: After the last zombie dies in each level, you can drop a ball, and click on the ball to advance to the next level * Failure: Of course the zombies that touch the last zombies on the placeable floor will enter your home * Difficulty: The last wave of zombies will be very fierce, so be sure to develop quickly in the early stage to resist the attack of zombies -------Peculiarity------- * Multiple ball types * Attack selects the sector of the attack *There will be hordes of zombies * The last wave of zombies will be extremely ferocious * There will be all kinds of armed zombies *Different kinds of balls are required * Zombies can be headshot *Unlock Hardmode after 12 levels
